text: Before I go to bed at night, I ice my face, because it closes your pores and makes a difference in the morning.
author: Jasmine Tookes

text: Everybody's after a new morning. What do we have to run up and salute tomorrow?
author: Robert Stone

text: I was the first in my peer group to get pregnant. All I craved was reassurance. I needed someone to tell me that all the seemingly random symptoms I had - weird things, such as excess saliva - were normal. And I was worried because I wasn't getting any morning sickness.
author: Heidi Murkoff

text: Taking pre-natal vitamins can minimise birth defects and can lower the chances both of morning sickness and premature delivery.
author: Heidi Murkoff

text: I love classical music and often listen to symphonies or opera in the morning.
author: William Mapother
